product_name: Terry Touring Bike T-Shorts - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The women's plus-size Terry Touring Bike T-Shorts with 8-panel styling and an endurance Flex Air Tour chamois offer great performance for riding long distances in warm weather. Nylon/polyester/spandex fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly. New wide waistband features a flattering elastic-free front waist. Flat-seam, 8-panel construction supports and feels comfortable next to your skin. New Terry-pink Flex Air Tour chamois is made in Italy and designed with extra multidensity foam for endurance riding. Chamois is also seamless, perforated throughout for ventilation, and features reduced bulk at the inner thighs to avoid chafing. Zippered pocket on hip secures ID and other small items. The women's plus-size Terry Touring Bike T-Shorts feature leg grippers that are woven for comfort.
short_description: The women's plus-size Terry Touring Bike T-Shorts with 8-panel styling and an endurance Flex Air Tour chamois offer great performance for riding long distances in warm weather.
